t: Santander and Amazon launch their new credit card Amazon Visa in Germany which rewards customers for purchases at no annual fee
s: August 12, 2024. Amazon and Santander today announced a partnership to launch its new Amazon Visa credit card in Germany. The card has no annual fee and does not require customers to open a new bank account.
